name: Deep Space Waifu: FANTASY
description:
The theme now is FANTASY GIRLS!

This is a simple SUPER CASUAL shmmup meant to be played even with one-hand.



This game is a new incarnation of the beloved series Deep Space Waifu!
As the hero foretold by The Prophecy, travel the land and meet all sorts of magical and heroic girls in your to save the kingdom of Hentalia…
Have your ONE HANDED sword ready…. you’ll need it!





The King Bear is transported to the Kingdom of Hentalia… against his will!
Now, he must find THE MYSTERIOUS THING and save the Kingdom!
...if he ever wishes to travel through the vastness of space again, that is.





- ONE HAND MODE !

- EPIC PLOT

- NEW SKILL SYSTEM

- UNIQUE BOSSES AND ENEMIES



Have a nice day BRAVE KNIGHT!!!
